alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:08PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 500 PM MST. * At 206 PM MST, a wall of dust moving across Interstate 10 in northeast Cochise county or east of Bowie. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 370 and 391. Locations impacted include... San Simon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
